text: What Price Decency is a 1933 American drama film directed by Arthur Gregor and starring Dorothy Burgess, Alan Hale and Walter Byron. The director adapted the story from one his own plays.Goble p.192 It is now considered a lost film. ==Cast== * Dorothy Burgess as Norma * Alan Hale as Klaus van Leyden * Walter Byron as Tom O'Neil * Henry Durant as Matizzi * Val Duran as Pimo ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1933 films Category:1933 drama films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by Arthur Gregor Category:American black-and-white films Category:Majestic Pictures films Category:Films made before the MPAA Production Code Category:Lost American films Category:American films based on plays Category:1933 lost films Category:Lost drama films
title: What Price Decency
